name: Running for Bet
description:
21/07/2022 -First prototype

Running these cute ducks and guessing which one will win.

The name under these ducks is actually for "what they represent", not ducks' names.

I made these ducks just because I want them to help me decide my dinner tonight. XD (not kidding)

22/07/2022

Update the input field, now you can input the Chinese.

27/07/2022

Update the background effect and UI and change the duck run speed.

--

It will be updated unragually.
